data.name: Pandaren
data.description:
Pandaren

Units:
+5% hit points
3x wider damage range

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Cask of Ale (+15% damage to 1 unit)
Dragon Concoction (100 damage in 175 AoE)
Viper Concoction (-8 armor in 175 AoE)

Traits: Very random and unpredictable chance based combat skills. Everything is left to the dice roll, nothing depends on you. So just kick back and relax, sip your drink and enjoy the show.

Difficulty: Beginer

auras.name: Hypersense Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Static Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack and move speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Village Guardians [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Dragon Warrior

Reduces spell damage to Weaponsmith, Martial Artist, Brewmaster and Sumo Wrestler by 20%. Increases their armor by 2.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: White Tiger Master [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Tiger Style

White Tiger Master replaces Weaponsmith
Melee Unit
+4 damage
+2 armor
Abilities:
Flurry (Self Spell)
(+100% AS for 5 sec)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
(15% damage in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Hand-to-Hand Combat
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Serpent Style
Crane Style

Type: Early Push

units.name: White Tiger Master
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Jade Serpent Master [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Serpent Style

Jade Serpent Master replaces Weaponsmith
Melee Unit
+4 damage
+25 HP
Abilities:
Ultimate Offense (Disable Mini Aura)
(-4 armor in 150 AoE)
Ultimate Defence (Passive Skill)
(35% to reduce damage to 30)
(affects strong creeps only)
Upgrades used:
Hand-to-Hand Combat
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Serpent Style
Crane Style

Type: Anti Heavy Creeps / Anti Armor

units.name: Jade Serpent Master
units.description:

bonuses.name: Red Crane Master [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Ricochet
+1 level of Crane Style

Red Crane Master replaces Martial Artist
Ranged Unit
-4 damage
+20% attack rate
Abilities:
Shuriken (Damage Spell)
(300 damage to 1 Air unit)
Mirror Image (Self Spell)
(1 illusion for 15 sec)
(illusions deal no damage)
Upgrades used:
Ranged Weapons
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Ricochet
Crane Style

Type: Anti Air

units.name: Red Crane Master
units.description:
Ranged Unit
Strong Vs Spellcaster
Weak Vs Melee Unit

bonuses.name: Potionmaster [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Taste My Brew

Potionmaster replaces Brewmaster
Spellcaster
+2 armor
+50 MP
Abilities:
Detox Potion (Disable Spell)
(dispels only negative buffs)
(20/15/10/5 sec cooldown)
(affects friendly organic units only)
Healing Salve (Healing Spell)
(150/200/250/300 HP over 10 sec)
(affects organic units only)
Upgrades used:
Brewing (Upgrades Abilities)
Cloth Armor
Crane Style
Taste My Brew

Type: Anti Buff / Healing

units.name: Potionmaster
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Ranged Unit

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Anti-Magic Shield [C]
bonuses.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.
Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Tiger Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 3x crit and damage
Affects: Weaponsmith and Martial Artist

Lv1: 10% chance, +4 damage
Lv2: 19% chance, +8 damage
Lv3: 27% chance, +12 damage
Lv4: 34% chance, +16 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Serpent Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 4 sec disarm and attack rate
Affects: Weaponsmith
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% chance, +5% attack rate
Lv2: 19% chance, +10% attack rate
Lv3: 27% chance, +15% attack rate
Lv4: 34% chance, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Ricochet
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing projectyles
Affects: Martial Artist and Watch Tower
(10% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: 1 bounce
Lv2: 2 bounces
Lv3: 3 bounces
Lv4: 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Crane Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: evasion and move speed
Affects: Weaponsmith, Martial Artist and Brewmaster

Lv1: +5% evasion and move speed
Lv2: +10% evasion and move speed
Lv3: +15% evasion and move speed
Lv4: +20% evasion and move speed

towerUpgrades.name: Ox Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 2 sec stun and hit points
Affects: Sumo Wrestler
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 1 sec duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 10% chance, +25 HP
Lv2: 19% chance, +50 HP
Lv3: 27% chance, +75 HP
Lv4: 34% chance, +100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Turtle Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: block and armor
Affects: Sumo Wrestler and Turtlerider

Lv1: 10% chance, +2 armor
Lv2: 19% chance, +4 armor
Lv3: 27% chance, +6 armor
Lv4: 34% chance, +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Decapitation
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to kill instantly
Affects: Cloud Serpent and Turtlerider
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
(affects summoned Cloud Serpents)

Lv1: 10% to kill instantly
Lv2: 19% to kill instantly
Lv3: 27% to kill instantly
Lv4: 34% to kill instantly

spells.name: Death From Afar (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reveals other player bases and deals 600 damage every 300 seconds to all enemy buildings.

Type: Super Weapon

towerUpgrades.name: Taste My Brew
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: curse in 175 AoE for 10 sec
Affects: Brewmaster
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% for 20% miss
Lv2: 19% for 20% miss
Lv3: 27% for 20% miss
Lv4: 34% for 20% miss

towerUpgrades.name: Dragon FAKING Warrior
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attribute bonus
Affects: Heroes
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +4 Str, Agi and Int
Lv2: +8 Str, Agi and Int
Lv3: +12 Str, Agi and Int
Lv4: +16 Str, Agi and Int

t1spell.name: A Few Fireworks [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: A Few More Fireworks [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends fireworks in at enemies.
Each firework deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.description:

skills.name: The Horde - Pandaren
skills.description:
Units:
+5% hit points
3x wider damage range

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Cask of Ale (+15% damage to 1 unit)
Dragon Concoction (100 damage in 175 AoE)
Viper Concoction (-8 armor in 175 AoE)

Traits: Very random and unpredictable chance based combat skills. Everything is left to the dice roll, nothing depends on you. So just kick back and relax, sip your drink and enjoy the show.

Difficulty: Beginer

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

barrack.name: Pagoda (Lv2)
barrack.description:
Gives:
Can train Heroes
+750 hit points
+2 armor
+7% unit spawning rate
+1 Melee Unit
+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Shado-Pan Leader
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Dragon Kick (Passive Skill)
14-26% to stun for 1.4-2 sec

Crane Takes Flight (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a radius
(500-650 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Tiger Paws (Self Spell)
60-90% attack rate bonus
(has 15 sec duration)

Turtle Stance (Passive Skill)
18-32% to block an attack

heroes.name: Legendary Brewmaster
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Breath of Fire (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line

Taste My Brew (Disable Skill)
20-40% miss chance in an area

Drunken Brawler (Passive Skill)
10-30% evasion and 2x crit

Storm, Earth And Fire (Self Spell)
splits into 3 units for 20-30 sec

heroes.name: Serpent Tamer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Fireworks (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(125-275 area of effect)

Special Brew Tonic (Support Spell)
2-8 armor bonus
(600-750 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% damage bonus

Serpent Mistress (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Serpents for 30-90 sec

heroes.name: Ancient Dragon Turtle
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9 sec stun
(300-600 area of effect)

Craggy Skin (Passive Skill)
150-180 dmg to melee attacker

Shell Spin (Damage Spell)
120-180 damage/sec for 9 sec

Stone Skin (Passive Skill)
20-34% to block an attack
